channel.title: Duplicating >.<
channel.description: Now that there are more people on, Does anyone know how to fix my duplicating problem. When i drop an item or a monster drops an item, i can pick it up, walk far away, come back and the item will be there again. People are gettin rich on my server and i dont want this lol Anyone had this problem before and could help me ?

item.description:

tell me how if you find out plz
joshua325@msn.com

item.description:
@Bryan_SG wrote:

I serched for, “pickup” and found nothing. I tried searching for “pick” again nothing. Iv seen it befor but cant find it now, thats causes problems lol

Read full topic

item.title: Duplicating >.<
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

it sounds like ur pickup function isn’t removing item for everyone, or isn’t keeping it removed
try opening client or clienthandler and searching for pickup and see what u can see, that might be off. sorry i know this doesn’t help much, but it’s a place to start, maybe u can paste that code, so someone can help with what’s wrong.

Read full topic
